Author: nursepenelope
Text: Yep! This has definitely happened to me too!! similarly another time a coworker saw an old picture of and said how thin I was... I weigh the same amount then as I do now and can wear the same clothes (I checked last time I went to my parents house). It just made me think damn, they’ll always see me as big. yes they acknowledge that I’ve lost weight but they’ll always see me as a big girl.
